snippet: The San Diego medical examiner’s office confirmed that the preserved brain tissue of Junior Seau was donated by his family to the National Institutes of Health’s National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke.
abstract: Family of late NFL linebacker Junior Seau, whose suicide added to the debate over head injuries in former players, donates some of his brain tissue to the National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke for research.
lead_paragraph: The San Diego medical examiner’s office confirmed that the preserved brain tissue of Junior Seau was donated by his family to the National Institutes of Health’s National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke.

headline.seo: Junior Seau’s Brain Tissue Is Donated for Study
headline.main: Seau Brain Tissue Is Donated to National Institute for Study
headline.print_headline: Seau Brain Tissue Is Donated to National Institute for Study

keywords.value: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke
